channel.title: Summer Project - 317
channel.description:
[center][i]Ok so most of you know its the summer holidays, so basicly 6 weeks of doing nothing.. [/i]
Most people will be wanting to start projects / join project teams.
[b]So here is your chance. [/b]
Name of project: Project 317. Goal: Re-Write Of WL's beta 317 server. Reason Why: It can be coded alot better and with better handling on alot of things. (including Packets)
This project is avaliable to join for anyone willing to stick to coding it.
I have started it. It is build up of packages,
Current packages Complete.
com.proj; com.proj.Gui; com.proj.Misc;
It has a working Gui, no more Command prompt needed if ran from a jar ;). It makes logs of when the server is ran and if it has been ran correctly.
There is currently no client handling will get around to that soon.
The project is compiled with apache ant. (like RSCD)
I am hosting a forums for this project. (not sure if im aloud to post this link mod remove if im not.) [url=http://project-317.no-ip.org]project 317 site.[/url]
Post if you wish to join with development. Website wise or Server Wise and i will accept or decline you.
Currently looking for.
Server Programmers. Forums Admin (will not accept just anyone. need to have a well know reputation) Main Page creator (need a new front page look)
Thanks - Grungy. [/center]

@grungy wrote:

ok, you will have to be a reserver untill more members register. (forums staff not realy needed anymore.)
